passage_text: A Wrinkle in Time is a science fantasy novel by American writer Madeleine L'Engle, first published in 1963. The story revolves around a young girl whose father, a government scientist, has gone missing after working on a mysterious project called a tesseract.

An elderly Nepali woman with facial wrinkles. A wrinkle, also known as a rhytide, is a fold, ridge or crease in the skin.
